attributes.action: Allow free access to all Ukranian passport holders who wish sanctuary in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Governments have stated that they support the people of Ukraine its time that they show it.
attributes.background: I want all Ukranian passport holders who wish to take sanctuary in the UK to have immediate entry without formal visa and safe access routes to be established,

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
